title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2021 Comments on Mass Vaccinations
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Shadow Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 3 January 2021.
content: Urgent we scale up mass vaccination given the variant spread with such speed. The initial target should be two million a week and then expand. We need:

Resources for all GPs to administer.  
Use Community Pharmacy.  
Mobile vaccine units for hard to reach communities.
